channel.title: Fun Quote Journals on Gag Tree Studio

item.title: Wall of Shame: Scored Journal of All the Funny and Dumb Things We Can't Unsay or Undo
item.description:
Tired of forgetting the absolute gems of hilarious nonsense your friends, coworkers, or family blurt out? Look no further! This logbook is here to immortalize those epic moments of verbal chaos.

This laugh-out-loud journal is your ultimate tool for documenting every face-melting quote, accidental joke, and brain-fart blunder. With its fun scoring system, youâ€™ll rank the best (or worst!) episodes and create a leaderboard of unforgettable moments. It’s also a great tool for team building and bonding, since we can be sure that all humans will human eventually.
